title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Surges 20.8%, Leading Index Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Chainlink (LINK) was also a top performer, gaining 8.6% from Tuesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2910.89, up 2.0% (+56.54) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

Eighteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BCH (+20.8%) and LINK (+8.6%).

Laggards: SUI (-0.3%) and XRP (-0.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index rose 2.0% with 18 of 20 assets trading higher, led by significant gains in BCH (+20.8%) and LINK (+8.6%).
